item.description:
The Pawtucket Red Sox won their first Governors' Cup title in 28 years on Thursday night in Fort Mill, South Carolina, topping the Knights 4-1. Nelson Figueroa earned his third clinching victory in the last few weeks. Figueroa was on the mound when the Sox clinched the wild card spot, when the Sox clinched the finals berth and got the victory over Charlotte.

The Pawsox and Reno Aces are in the one-game, winner-take-all Triple-A final in Durham, NC on tonight at 7pm.

Murphy's will be having Karaoke at 9, but has said they can keep the sound on in the back part of the bar.

 

I will be there to watch the game at some point, but can't make it at the start of the game thus the officially "unhosted" status of this outing.

If you get there early, please ask the bartender to put the game on: NBC Sports Network will carry the game live in Rhode Island:

Cox Channel 1139

Fios Channel 90 (590 HD)

Comcast Channel 865

DirectTV 603 (might be 220 now)
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for the group watching the baseball game. :-)
item.name: FYI - Pawsox in the AAA Championship (on NBCSports) @ Murphy's
